about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a medieval fantasy world with this fantasy exterior tileset from Winlu. This tileset allows you to build a variety of houses and castles with a wide range of wall textures and windows, as well as roofs to make each of your houses look unique. From a simple house to a castle or a dark tower, everything you need is included!

There are also numerous assets for flora, vegetation and landscapes. Wide meadows, forests and mountains are possible with this package. With a large selection of flowers, mushrooms and trees, you can create a lot of vegetation variation.

Countless animated sprites such as flags, torches, lamps, fireplaces, doors, gates, usable boxes, levers, switches and a water wheel are included in this package, which breathe life into your game.

Includes:

* 18 character sheets
* 9 tile sheets


* UPDATES May 2023:

-Addded a red grass/bush/tree version
-Added animated street lamp in characters
-Improved the gate_stone and Gate_wood sprites in characters.
-Improved water tiles
-Added missing tiles for water_wall edges in Outside_D.
-Added and improved waterfall animation sprites in characters
-Added a few missing fence tiles in Outside_B.
-Added giant glowing trees
-Added new tower roofs


* UPDATE OCT 2023: Remastered / recolored tiles


* UPDATE March 2024:

Added animated flowers and bushes
Added 12 frame animated drawbridge
Improved pixelart on most tiles
Added a tree without leaves

* UPDATE August 2024:

-Added animated diagonal water
-Added diagonal castle walls
-Overall sprites and tiles improvement
-Added 8 frame animated pixelart Chimneys


Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
